did.abstract: A receipt book of goods received from John Butler as payment for rental of a tract of land granted by Lewis Morris in Oyster Bay, Long Island in 1656.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Gift of James C. Townsend of Oyster Bay, 1864. The item was formally accessioned in 1977.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection consists of a single item.

prefercite.p: Identification of item, date (if known); John Butler receipt book, 1977.456, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Public Library, Center for Brooklyn History.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: A receipt book of goods received from John Butler as payment for rental of a tract of land granted by Lewis Morris in Oyster Bay, Long Island in 1656.
